results.title: City slickers (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Castle Rock, Nelson Entertainment, Face Production, Irby Smith and Ron Underwood
results.brief_description: Boss breathing down your neck? Bank manager screaming? Family driving you crazy? Then it’s about time you took a break on the the wild west side! Die hard city fellas Mitch, Phil and Ed are edging 40 and desperately searching for their lost youth. When they try to recapture it with a two week cattle-driving vacation in the midwest they discover that playing cowboy is more than just ridin’, ropin’, and sleepin’ out under the stars. These city slickers thought surviving mid-life crisis was tough. That’s nothing compared to the ride they’re about to take. Stars Billy Crystal and Jack Palance in an endearing and funny adventure that will have the whole family in stitches.

results.title: city school diary_05
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.

results.title: City scene
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Gordon Burwash, Guy Glover and George Kaczender
results.brief_description: No matter where you go in the world, it is in the city square that you see the character and culture of a people. Filmed in Montreal, Athens, and Bangkok, this film makes interesting comparisons of life at the core of three great cities. Photography by Paul Leach.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Gordon Burwash, Guy Glover and George Kaczender

results.title: City sailors
results.creator_credit: Australian news and Information Bureau, R. Maslyn Williams and Jack Rogers
results.brief_description: Shows Sydney Harbour with its wide scope for sailing, the innumerable bays and inlets which provide safe mooring and the warm sunlit days which have made sailing a popular summer pastime. Commentator: James Dibble.

results.title: City port
results.creator_credit: Abacus Documentaries, David Powell and Roger Dunton
results.brief_description: Shows how the City of London, Lloyd’s, the Bank of England and other commercial institutions support the Port of London, and how the Port supplies goods to the city.

results.title: City out of time
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Colin Low
results.brief_description: A portrait of Venice that expores the rich legacy of art bequeathed to all. Two hundred years ago Canaletto caught its elusive beauty, and in this film details of his pictures rise before you - spired churches and turreted palaces soar into a blue Mediterranean sky. Narrated by William Shatner. (Award: Vancouver)
